6rVG9SwL.title: Study of Nonisothermal Crystallization Behavior and Mechanics Performance of PPS/TLCP Blend
6rVG9SwL.abstract: The nonisothermal crystallization and melting behaviors of the blends of poly(p-phenylene sulfide)(PPS)with wholly aromatic and semiaromatic thermotropic liquid crystalline polyester(TLCP)were investigated,the crystallization process and crystallite structure of the blends were analyzed by means of DSC and PLM,and the mechanical properties of the blends were also studied.The results showed the addition of TLCP caused a great increase in the max crystallization temperature and overall crystallization rate of PPS,wholly aromatic TLCP changed the mechanism of the nucleation of the PPS crystals from homogeneous nucleation to heterogeneous nucleation,on the contrast semiaromatic TLCP accelerated the spherulitic growth rate of PPS.The addition of 2% wholly aromatic TLCP could improve both the tensile and impact strength of PPS.

k8LP4xvZ.title: Melting and nonisothermal crystallization behavior of polypropylene/hemp fiber composites
k8LP4xvZ.abstract: Melting and nonisothermal crystallization behaviors of polypropylene (PP) and PP/hemp fibers (HFs) composites was investigated by differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) technique. The results show that the incorporation of HFs increases both the melting temperature (T m) and crystallization temperature (T c) of PP. Moreover, in comparison with PP/HF(70/30) composite, the addition of maleic anhydride-grafted PP (PP-MAH) results in a slight decrease in Tm but a significant increase in T c of PP. The higher T c of PP in the composites implies that HFs could act as nucleating agents for the crystallization of PP. Nonisothermal crystallization kinetics analysis was performed using Avrami and Mo models. The values of half-time (t 1/2) and rate constant indicate that the crystallization rate increases with the increasing of cooling rate for all the specimens. However, the crystallization rate of PP/HF(70/30) composite is found to be lower than that of PP at a certain cooling rate. Additionally, the composite containing PP-MAH has the lowest crystallization rate. Lower overall crystallization rate of PP/HF composites compared to PP is probably due to sufficiently high density of nuclei, which hinders the transport of PP molecular chains to crystal surface during nonisothermal crystallization. The crystallization activation energies (δE) determined by Kissinger method are 207.4 KJ/m 2, 218.5 KJ/m 2, and 220.4 kJ/m 2 for PP, PP/HF(70/30), and PP/HF/PP-MAH(70/30/5), respectively. © 2011 The Author(s) Reprints and permissions.

RX6r1YJy.title: Electrospinning Factors of Controlling Poly(Arylene Sulfide Sulfone) Nanofibers Diameter
RX6r1YJy.abstract: Since processing parameter of electrospinning is various,orthogonal experiments were designed and performed to determine effects of solution concentration,environment temperature,voltage,receiving distance and flux on diameter of PASS nanofiber.According to the orthogonal experiments results,solution concentration is the most influential parameter to PASS nanofiber,whereas environment temperature to be the least one.

il5yu9CU.title: The Synthesis of Polyarylene Imide Sulfide
il5yu9CU.abstract: The method of solution polycondensation was introduced to prepare a novel resin-polyarylene imide sulfide(PASI).The 4,4-dichloridearylene imide and the sodium sulfide was used to introduce the stiff ring of imide to polyarylene sulfide chain.The structure of the polymer was preliminarily studied by FT-IR,1H-NMR,UV.The crystallization behaviour and thermal property of the polymer were also studied by X-ray diffraction and DSC,TG.The results shows that the polymer is the structure of PASI.The X-ray diffraction shows that the resin is crystalline.The heat analysis shows that the resin is well heat-resistant and has very good thermal stability and Tg=101 ℃.The Tg is better 10 ℃ than polyphenylene sulfide.The PASI resin will be applied abraod.

vaKDDqOO.title: Progress in Manufacture and Application of Oriented Electrospun Nanofibers
vaKDDqOO.abstract: In this paper,device and principle of electrospinning were described. For manufacturing oriented nanofibers with good properties,the research of instability in electrospun process was carried out. Introduced three kinds of instabilities,respectively,and analyzed the reason. Through changing the collector,controlling electric field and adding magnetic field,which modified the electrospun technology to manufacture high oriented nanofibers,meanwhile,a simple evaluation to various methods to be done,and also point out the magnetic electrospinning (MES) is the most promising methods for fabricating orientation nanofibers. Some applications of oriented nanofibers in tissue engineering was introduced,and the way forward for this nanofibers was suggested at last.

hnmhav5j.title: Structures and Properties of PPS Blown Film
hnmhav5j.abstract: The HAAKE extrusion-blow equipment was employed and polyphenylene sulfide(PPS)blown film was successfully prepared.With the analysis results of DSC and X-ray diffractometer,the impact of draw ratio and blow ratio on the structures and mechanical properties of the blown film was studied.The results showed that draw ratio and blow ratio had a great impact on the structure of the PPS blown film as well as its mechanical properties.With the increase of the draw ratio and blow ratio,the orientation degree,crystallinity,and modulus blown of the film increased,but its tensile strength and elongation at break increased firstly and then decreased.

jtxkVrwG.title: Preparation of PASS Membrane—Permeability and Separation Property
jtxkVrwG.abstract: Polyarylene sulfide sulfone (PASS) belongs to a new generation of heat-resistant thermoplastics and has already been used as an excellent membrane material. Base on the previous research results,the effects of processing parameters on permeabilities and separation properties of PASS membranes were studied in this paper. According to the experimental results,evaporating time should be about 60s and amount of polyethylene glycol (PEG) should be less than 5% to obtain a PASS membrane with good permeability. Furthermore,precipitating bath with higher precipitating ability will lead to a higher separation property and lower permeability of PASS membrane.

kJArOnIA.title: The Influence of PASS Solution Characteristic on the Solution Electrospinnability and Morphology of the Nanofibers
kJArOnIA.abstract: Solution of poly(arylene sulfide sulfone)(PASS) was prepared in the mixed solvent of phenol and 1,1,2,2-tetrachlorothane. Phenol is a kind of solvent with high boiling point and low evaporation rate.The influence of dynamic viscosity,conductivity and surface tension of PASS/(phenol and 1,1,2,2-tetrachlorothane) on the solution electrospinnability,beads formation and the average diameter of the nanofibers were investigated.The result shows that the solution electrospinnability is depended on solution real number viscosity and surface tension.The sizes of fibers diameters are strongly affected by solution real number viscosity.

WvKBj97e.title: Preparation and characterization of polyarylene sulfide kentone amide separation membrane
WvKBj97e.abstract: Polyarylene sulfide ketone amide (PASKA) separation membrane was prepared through phase inversion method using N-methylpyrrolidone (NMP) as solvent. Effects of PASKA mass fraction on the cross-section and surface morphology were observed by SEM and AFM, respectively and surface roughness influnced by PASKA mass fraction were also analysized. With the mass fraction increasing, the membrane top surface becomes denser and the roughness tested by AFM is lesser, besides the pore size in the membrane becomes smaller and water flux through the membrane becomes less. The distinction of membrane structure and property in different preservation ways was explained contrastly and it's suitable to preserve the membrane that is dealt in glycerin.

0vTA6bq0.title: Study on Non-isothermal Crystallization Properties of PPS/MWCNT Composites
0vTA6bq0.abstract: The non-isothermal crystallization process of poly(phenylene sulfide)/multi-wall carbon nanotube(PPS/MWCNT)composites were studied by means of DSC.The Mo equation was used to analyze the non-isothermal crystallization kinetics.The results showed that the Mo equation could characterize the non-isothermal crystallization behavior of PPS/MWCNT composites.The crystallization of PPS was promoted by the addition of MWCNT,for the crystallization rate and the crystallization temperature of composites were increased obviously.With the content of MWCNT increased,the crystallization temperature and crystallization rate of composites first increased and then decreased,which reached the maximum when the content of MWCNT was 3 wt%.

d2lrB2Ts.title: Study on Supercritical Carbon Dioxide Foaming PPS
d2lrB2Ts.abstract: In this paper,PPS foam was prepared by intermittent batch forming of supercritical carbon dioxide.Crystallization property,dynamic mechanical property and the morphology of the PPS foam were studied.Pressure-induced crystallization occurred when PPS was soaked in CO2.The PPS soaked in CO2 for 2 h at 80 ℃ and a pressure of 20 MPa could foam while that soaked for 4 h and 8 h could not foam because of the high degree of crystallinity.This method laid theoretical foundation for the further study of PPS foam.

zarOkv67.abstract: The crystalline behaviors of the matrix polymer in polymer/clay nanocompos- ires and polymer/nanoparticles composites are reviewed.The mechanisms of the effect of nano-particles on polymer crystallization are also discussed.

DaH1LI3k.title: Friction and Wear Properties of Polyphenylene Sulfide/Thermotropic Liquid Crystalline Polymer Blend
DaH1LI3k.abstract: The friction and wear properties of polyphenylene sulfide/thermotropic liquid crystal polymer (PPS/TLCP) blend were studied. The worn surfaces and fractured surfaces of the blend were observed by means of scanning electron microscopy (SEM).The results showed the friction and wear properties of PPS were greatly improved with the addition of TLCP. The friction coefficient of the blend did not alter significantly with the increase of the TLCP content, but the wear volume changed greatly;when the mass fraction of TLCP was 10%, the wear volume was minimum, being 0.004cm3. The observation by SEM revealed the main wear mode of the blend was adhesive wear and particle abrasion. It was found that the dispersed phase TLCP could fibrillated in the blend.

WXeKSEsw.abstract: Electrospinning of poly(arylene sulfide sulfone)(PASS) nanofibers was tentatively studied.PASS was dissolved in the mixed solvent of phenol and 1,1,2,2-tetrachlorothane.The effects on the morphologies of PASS nanofibers of the solution component,environment temperature,applied voltage and tip-screen distance were investigated.

gIvvqLlD.title: Controlling Porosity of PES Porous Microspheres Prepared via Electrospraying
gIvvqLlD.abstract: The focus of this work was to effectively control the porosity of microspheres prepared via electrospraying,which would establish the foundation for the following application.Scanning electron microscopy(SEM) and thermogravimetry(TG) were employed to evaluate the morphology and the porosity of microspheres,respectively.According to the investigation result,adding hydrophilic polymer polyethylene glycol(PEG) and polyving akohol(PVA) to electrosprayed solution could effectively control the porosity of microspheres.Specifically adding hydrophilic polymer could improve porosity;and that,with increasing hydrophilic polymer,the porosity of microspheres first increased and then decreased;the control effect of PVA for the porosity of microspheres was better than that of PEG,when the addition of PVA was 3 %,the porosity of microspheres was the highest value of 91.35 %.

tmG8aG7Q.title: the Hydrolysis and Photolyis of Dimethomorph in Water
tmG8aG7Q.abstract: The analysis method of dimethomorph in water was established and the hydrolysis and photolysis in water of dimethomorph were studied.[Methods] HPLC was employed in this research.[Results] Dimethomorph was found quite stable in water.Photolysis kinetics of dimethomorph and the Z-isomer/E-isomer were simulated with two different time segment equations respectively,both of which were found constant with the first order kinetics.Half-life of photolysis of dimethomorph in two time periods(0-120 and 120-638 h) were 76.8 and 208 h respectively.No obvious difference of the photolysis rates between E-isomer and Z-isomer was observed in water.It was also verified that E-isomer could transform to Z-isomer with high rate under illumination?condition.[Conclusions] The results of kinetic behaviors of dimethomorph in water were obtained,which could provide data for the future environmental risk assessments and managements of dimethomorph.

NLFJY8Mb.title: An Evaluation on the Toxicity of Insecticide Pyriproxyfen to Silkworm(Bombyx mori L.)
NLFJY8Mb.abstract: Pyriproxyfen is a new type of insecticides which belong to insect growth regulators.It has the characteristics of broad-spectrum,high efficiency and low toxicity etc.In order to clarify whether the environmental contamination from using pyriproxyfen for agricultural pest control causes chronic toxicity to silkworm(Bombyx mori L.),the present study determined the effect of pyriproxyfen to the growth and development of silkworm with leaf dipping method.The results indicated that pyriproxyfen had low acute toxicity to the 2nd instar silkworm larvae,with LC50 at 96 h greater than 1 000 mg/L.The symptoms of acute toxicity of larva included vomiting,head and thorax swelling,and body twisting into "S" shaped.The chronic toxicity of pyriproxyfen to the 2nd instar silkworm larvae was relatively high,with significant influence on growth and development of the larvae.The major symptoms included yellow body color,no eating,no movement,and slow growth.All larvae feeding on mulberry leaves treated with 75～1 000 mg/L of pyriproxyfen showed prolonged larval duration,higher body weight at moulting,uneven development,and a final failure in normal cocooning and pupation.According to these test results,the toxicity of pyriproxyfen to silkworm is slow and durable.It should be far away from mulberry field when used for agricultural pest control.

rslHYfnQ.title: Toxicity of Some Insecticides on Mallada desjardinsi
rslHYfnQ.abstract: Mallada desjardinsi is a common predator of insect pests in citrus orchard.By drug-film method,toxicities of six insecticides on M.desjardinsi were determined in laboratory.Toxicity ranked from high to low was chlorpyrifos,omethoate,carbosulfan,cyhalothrin,abamectin and azadirachtin.LC95 of the first five insecicides was 18.67,324.48,1694.80,11520.83,642592.76 mg/L,respectively,and LC50 was 8.20,41.03,134.85,527.89,7799.57 mg/L,respectively.The toxicity of azadirachtin was too low to be detected,so it was the safest among the six pesticides.

shmgeZRk.title: Study on the antimicrobial activity of alkaloids from Sophora flavescens on plant pathogens in vitro
shmgeZRk.abstract: Antimicrobial activities of total alkaloids from Sophora flavescens and its monomer matrine,oxymatrine,sophoridine,sophocarpine,cytosine to 11 plant pathogenic fungi and 3 bacteria were determined in vitro.The results showed that only the total alkaloids to Phytophthora drechsleri and Colletotrichum gloeosporioides,and sophoridine to Phytophthora drechsler ihad relatively high activities,the percentage of inhibition on mycelial growth with the application concentration of 500 mg/L were 96.18%,54.90 % and 93.62% respectively.The EC50 of total alkaloids and sophoridine to Phytophthora drechsleri were 178.21mg/L and 162.13mg/L.These samples had little effects on the growth of 3 bacteria,the percentage of growth inhibition were all less than 20%.

6UWTaIAK.title: Inhibition of Several Herbicides on the Growth of Scenedesmus obliquus
6UWTaIAK.abstract: Inhibitory activity of 10 herbicides,which including 3 technical products and 7 formulated products,and involving 12 kinds of active ingredients,on the growth of Scenedesmus obliquus were tested by spectrophotometric method in laboratory.The results indicated that there are 5 herbicides showed high toxicity to Scenedesmus obliquus,2 herbicides showed moderate toxicity,while only 3 herbicides with low toxicity.As a whole,sulfonylureas,diuron,metazachlor,diflufenican with the high toxicity to Scenedesmus obliquus.

b37HrpNs.title: Comparison of the sensitivities of five Alternaria plant pathogens to ten fungicides
b37HrpNs.abstract: The sensitivities of 5 different Alternaria plant pathogens,Alternaria solani,A.mali,A.brassicae,A.kikuchiana and A.longipes to 10 fungicides were determined in vitro.The results showed that the sensitivity of different Alternaria species to the same fungicide was similar.Prochloraz,SYP-Z048, difenoconazole,iprodione and procymidone had relatively higher activity to mycelial growth of the 5 pathogens than the other fungicides,and the 50% effective concentration(EC50) values ranged from 0.01 μg/mL to 1.28 μg/mL.Chlorothalonil had the highest effect on spore germination of the pathogens tested,followed by kresoxim-methyl and azoxystrobin.

UbJJvhXV.title: Status and Analysis of Registered Pesticides on Sugarcane in China
UbJJvhXV.abstract: Currently, chemical pesticides are still good tool for controlling pest of sugarcane,and pesticide play importance role in the development of sugarcane industry. By outlining the major sugarcane diseases, insects and weeds, analyzing registered insecticides, fungicides,herbicides characteristics, the author put forward several proposals aimed at guiding pesticide registration on sugarcane.

4AVpFyME.title: The toxicity determination of 20 pesticides against Unaspis yanonensis
4AVpFyME.abstract: Unaspis yanonensis (Kuwana) is one of the important insect pests in the orange production process. To select the pesticide which can replace the organophosphorus pesticide with high toxicity, the toxicities of 20 kinds of common pesticides applying against U. yanonensis were determined by the means of soaking under laboratory conditions. The order of toxicities of the 20 insecticides from high to low against the first instar larva of Unaspis yanonensis Kuwan was emamectin benzoate>abamectin>xiaochongliulin>buprofezin>methidathion>imidacloprid>acephate>chlorpyrifos>quinalphos>phosmet>phenthoate>trichlorfon>propoxur>cyfluthrin>fenpropathrin>methoxyfenozide>fenoxycarb>beta-cypermethrin>lime sulfur>petroleum oil.

2rPYTAMf.title: Development of Researchs on Pendimethalin Biodegradation with Environmental Microorganisms
2rPYTAMf.abstract: As a persistent bioaccumulative toxicant,the herbicide pendimethalin is applied widely,which increases the risk of environmental pollution.In this paper,the influence of pendimethalin on environmental microorganisms was reviewed,which showed that microorganism was tolerant to pendimethalin and some bacterium and fungus,including Bacillus sp.,Penicillium sp.and Aspergillus sp.,could degrade this pendimethalin.Furthermore,the metabolic pathways of different microorganisms to pendimethalin were stated.It was suggested that research should be carried out to separate microorganism strains and explore the degradation mechanism to promote the practical application of pesticide-degrading microorganism.

61WS1Fgi.title: Trehalose——the blood sugar in insects
61WS1Fgi.abstract: Trehalose is a nonreducing disaccharide in which the two glucose units are linked in an α,α-1,1-glycosidic linkage.As the main blood sugar in insects,trehalose plays an important role in metabolism and stress resistance in insects.The paper reviewed the discovery of trehalose and its chemical properties,physiological function and catabolism pathways of trehalose in insects as well.The further research of trehalose was prospected in the end of the paper.

RZGiQGjD.title: Study on Leaching of Monosulfuron-ester in Soil
RZGiQGjD.abstract: Analytical method for the determination of monosulfuron-ester residue in soil was established and leaching behavior of monosulfuron-ester in three kinds of soil which represented China situation were studied with the method of thin soil layer in laboratory.The results showed that the recovery rate of the analytical method was between 77.5 to 105%,RSD was between 2.51 to 9.06%,the LOQ was 0.218mg/kg.The results of soil leaching test for monosulfuron-ester showed that the Rf of the soils took from Henan,Neimenggu and Yunnan were 0.75,0.75 and 0.59 respectively,the migration of monosulfuron-ester in soil collected from Henan and Neimenggu province were moveable and in soil collected from Yunnan province was middle moveable.The characteristic of soil leaching for monosulfuron-ester was related to the physical and chemical properties of soil.The leaching of monosulfuron-ester in soil was feeble with decreasing of pH and increasing of clay content of soil.

WffRml8i.title: Trehalase activity and carbohydrate content of the cotton bollworm,Helicoverpa armigera (Hbner) (Lepidoptera:Noctuidae) in response to several botanical compounds
WffRml8i.abstract: In insects,carbohydrates play an important role in both energy metabolism and material synthesis.The main purpose of the present study is to evaluate the effects of four compounds(scopolamine hydrobromide,nicotine,esculin and saponin) on trehalase activity and content of related carbohydrates in larvae of the cotton bollworm,Helicoverpa armigera(H(u|¨)bner).The results showed that at 96 h after treatment in larvae with saponin,the larval growth was significantly inhibited,and the mortality was enhanced with the increasing saponin concentration.At the dosages of 10,20,40 g/L saponin,the mean weights of larvae were 0.194,0.089 and 0.034 g,being 86.99%,39.91%and 15.24%of the control, respectively.According to the determined trelalase activity as well as the activities of related metabolic enzymes,β-glucosides significantly inhibited the trehalase activity in the midgut while alkaloid inhibited the trehalase activity in the haemolymph and fat body obviously.Trehalase activity in the midgut was about 54.21%of the control at 96 h after the larvae were exposed to saponin at the dose of 40 g/L,while 83.73%of the control after the larvae were exposed to esculin at the dose of 30 g/L.Trelalase activities in both the hemolymph and fat body were 7.24%and 71.43%of the control,respectively,at 96 h after the larvae were exposed to scopolamine hydrobromide at the dose of 20 g/L,while 26.29%and 33.44%of the control after the larvae were exposed to nicotine at the dose of 20 g/L.Trehalose activity in the hemolymph was all increased by scopolamine hydrobromide,nicotine and esculin.All the four compounds affected the activity of glycogen phosphorylase.Saponin inhibited significantly the activity of glycogen phosphorylase in the midgut and fat body.The glycogen level changed consequently in contrast to the activity of glycogen phosphorylase with the increasing of compound concentration.When the larvae fed with botanical compounds,the change of glucose content in the hemolymph was consistent with that of trehalose content, and glycogen content in fat body was all declined to some extent.The results proved thatβ-glucosides could inhibit the trelalase activity,and this may have reference value in developing new pesticide compounds.

qpZzQwio.title: Carbosulfan resistance selection and cross-resistance to lamda-cyhalothrin and phoxim in Asian corn borer,Ostrinia furnacalis.
qpZzQwio.abstract: The topical application method has been applied with carbosulfan in selection of a susceptible strain of Asian corn borer,Ostrinia furnacalis(Guenée),for 10 successive selection generations.After the 5th generation,the LD_50 was 2.50 μg per larva with resistance ratio of 3.23,significantly higher than that of susceptible.It was demonstrated that there was apparent cross-resistance when carbosulfan was delt with lamda-cyhalothrin or phoxim resistant strain.It was suggested that when carbosulfan was sprayed for controlling the Asian corn borer in field,spraying times need to be limited and alternating insecticide will be selected.

O3SdwDpc.title: A Study on Bioactivity of Pyrethroid Insecticides to Chilo Suppressalis
O3SdwDpc.abstract: This paper investigated the bioactivity of 10 pyrethroid insecticides to striped rice borer Chilo suppressalis (walker) in the lab. The results showed that the LD50 (μg/larva) of beta-cyfluthrin, lambda-cyhalothrin, esfenvalerate, deltamethrin, fenpropathrin, alpha-cypermethrin, beta-cypermethrin, cycloprothrin, etofenprox, and silafluofen to C. suppressalis are 0.0017, 0.0039, 0.0043, 0.0070, 0.0071, 0.0116, 0.0119, 0.714, 0.1779, 0.3858, respectively. Bioactivity of 5 formulations of lambda-cyhalothrin to C. suppressalis (walker) are different. The LC50 (mg/L) of EW, EC, ME, SC and WP formulations of lambda-cyhalothrin to C. suppressalis (walker) are 0.0945, 0.1089, 0.1174, 0.1232, 0.1591, respectively.

VkGszvgy.title: Analysis Method for Determination of Nicosulfuron Residues in Soil using UPLC-MS/MS
VkGszvgy.abstract: The analysis method of nicosulfuron in soil was established using UPLC-MS/MS.The soil sample were extracted by the mixture of water and acetonitrile then determined by UPLC-MS/MS.The average recoveries rate and RSD of nicosulfuron in soil were 83.1～106.2% and 3.2～8.6% respectively.The LOQ of the analysis method was 1.0μg/kg.The method was sensitive,simple and less use of organic solvent so that reliable to analysis nicosulfuron residues in soil.

BF5b68F0.title: Application Effects of Botype Rice Specific Fertilizer in Black Soil
BF5b68F0.abstract: Pot experiments were conducted to preliminary study the effects of biotype rice specific fertilizers in black soil,supplying according for biotype rice specific fertilizers more completely.The results indicated that all biotype rice specific fertilizers could promote potassium absorption and increase plant biomass in all growth stages.Plant dry weights of using biotype rice specific fertilizers treatment were 4.3%-8.1% higher than chemical fertilizer treatments contain equal nutrient contents at heading stage.The content soil available nutrients at the later growth stage was also higher in biotype rice specific fertilizers treatment than that inchemical fertilizer treatments,indicating the better effects of bio-fertilizers.Compared with common fertilizer treatment,the using efficiency of nitrogen,phosphorus and potassium for biotype fertilizer I treatment increased 11.8%,18.9%and 26.6%,respectively.The yield of biotype fertilizer I treatment was higher significantly than other treatments.The quality of biotype fertilizer I treatment rice better than other treatments,but didn’t reach notable leave.

fhNJZEVf.title: Environmental Behaviors Including Hydrolysis,Photolysis and Volatility of Dithianon
fhNJZEVf.abstract: This paper described the investigation of environment fate behaviors including volatility, hydrolysis and photolysis of the fungicide dithianon under laboratory conditions. The experimental results showed that the t1/2 of hydrolysis were 42.5 d[pH 5, (25±1) °C], 84.5 h[pH 7, (25±1) °C], 19.3 h[pH 5, (50±1) °C] and 85.6 min[pH 7, (50±1) °C] and it quickly hydrolyzed in buffer solution of pH 9. The t1/2 of photolysis was 52.1 min(light power 4313 lx, UV 92.3 μw/cm2). No volatility was found in the air, water and the surface of soil(clay,YunNan). According to "Chemical Pesticide Environmental Safety Evaluation Test Guideline", dithianon was easier and easiest to hydrolyze, very easy to photolyze in pour water and hard to volatilize in the air, water and the surface of soil(clay,Yunnan).

YpzxpdLZ.title: Degradation of Novel Insecticide of Fufenozide in Soils
YpzxpdLZ.abstract: The degradation of fufenozide in three different soils was investigated under aerobic laboratory conditions.Degradation rate of fufenozide in 3 kinds of soils in the increasing order was Henan soil>Jilin soil>Jiangxi soil.The corresponding half-lives were 315,365 and 231d at 25℃,respectively and the degradation of fufenozide in soils followed the first-order kinetic equation.The degradation rate of fufenozide in Henan soil was the highest in three kinds of soils.Based on the Chinese dividing standard of pesticide residue in soil,fufenozide belonged to relative difficult degradable pesticide.The degradation of fufenozide in unsterilized soils was faster than that in sterilized soils.Microorganisms might play an important role in the degradation of fufenozide in soils.

PwWUAfKG.title: Selection of Ostrinia furnacalis(Guenée) by lambda-cyhalothrin and its effect on the activity of trehalase
PwWUAfKG.abstract: In order to evaluate the resistance of Asian corn borer,Ostrinia furnacalis(Guene),to lambda-cyhalothrin,the successive selection keeping about 50% insects alive by topical application has been carried out for 11 generations.And the activities of trehalase in different instars and different tissues of the fifth instars were tested with the method of glucose oxidase.It is shown that the LD50 of the F10 generation is 0.043 μg/individual.There is no significant difference in LD50 between the control F0(0.045 μg/individual) and any other generation,except the F3 generation with the LD50 of 0.086 μg/individual.The activities of trehalase of egg,the 3rd larvae,the 4th larvae and pupa were 14.54,31.42,53.28 and 30.79 mU/mg pro.,significantly lower compared to those in the control.Moreover,the activities of trehalase in blood and midgut of the 5th larvae were 8.05 mU/mg pro.and 140.97 mU/mg pro.significantly lower than the control.

kQZht8CS.title: Hydrolysis and Photolysis of Sulfonylurea Herbicide Monosulfuron in Water
kQZht8CS.abstract: The hydrolysis and photolysis of monosulfuron in water were investigated with high performance liquid chromatography in laboratory conditions.The results showed that the hydrolysis half-lives of monosulfuron were 42.5 d,248 d and 19.7 h in pH 5,pH 7 and pH 9 buffer solutions at 25℃,respectively.At 50℃,the levels of hydrolysis of monosulfuron were 32.8 h,117 h and 12.5 h in three different buffer solutions correspondingly.The hydrolytic rate of monosulfuron increased with the temperature increasing and the temperature coefficients were 1.58-50.9.The hydrolysis of monosulfuron was the most rapid in alkali buffer solution and the most tardy under neutral condition.The smallest values of activation energy and activation entropy were obtained from hydrolysis in pH 9 buffer solution.The photolysis half-life of monosulfuron was 45.3 h under the test condition.

BW71lQ5W.title: Simplified Method for Determination of Hydramethylnon Residues in Water using UPLC-MS/MS
BW71lQ5W.abstract: The analysis method of hydramethylnon in water was established using UPLC-MS/MS.The water sample were extracted by the mixture of hexane and acetone then determined by UPLC-MS/MS.The average recoveries rate and RSD of hydramethylnon in water were 91.8～93.2% and 2.78～6.02% respectively.The method was sensitive,rapid and simple so that reliable to determine the hydramethylnon residues in water.

hx53BzxG.title: Study on degradation dynamics of Z-and E-isomers of dimethomorph in soils
hx53BzxG.abstract: The degradation of dimethomorph in three kinds of soils including Jilin black soil,Henan cinnamon soil and Jiangxi red soil were investigated in laboratory conditions.The results indicated that the degradation half-life of dimethomorph were 69 d,69 d and 462 d in Jilin black soil,Henan cinnamon soil and Jiangxi red soil,respectively.Dimethomorph was classified into middle or difficultly degradation of pesticide.The degradation half-life in Jilin black soil,Henan cinnamon soil and Jiangxi red soil were 89 d,126 d and 533 d for Z-isomer and 53 d,29 d and 408 d for E-isomer.The degradation rates of Z-isomer are slower than E-isomer in all three kinds of soils tested.The ratios of E-isomer to Z-isomer changed obviously during degradation process in Henan cinnamon soil.The degradation rate of dimethomorph in laboratory condition is lower than that of in field condition abviously.

8ArA8KHT.title: Study on hydrolysis and photolysis of monosulfuron-ester in water
8ArA8KHT.abstract: The hydrolysis and photolysis of monosulfuron-ester in water were investigated by high performance liquid chromatography in laboratory conditions.The hydrolysis half-life of monosulfuron-ester were 13.1,192 and 347 d in pH 5,pH 7 and pH 9 buffer solution respectively and were classified as easily or difficultly hydrolysis type under 25 ℃.In the condition of 50 ℃,the half-life of hydrolysis of monosulfuron-ester were 19.6 h and 4.6,7.1 d in three different buffer solutions correspondingly and were classified as easily hydrolysis type.The hydrolytic rate of monosulfuron-ester increased with higher temperature and temperature coefficients were 32.7-48.9.Monosulfuron-ester is degraded most rapidly in acid buffer and most tardily in alkali buffer.There were significant positive correlations between both of the activation energy and activation entropy with pH value of buffer solution.The photolysis half-life of monosulfuron-ester was 4.9 h and classified as easily photolysis under the condition of 25 ℃,3 620 lx of light intensity and 71.1 μW/cm2 of UV intensity.

XC4MDDig.title: Study on toxicity of acephate to Scenedesmus obliquus and degradation of bacteria to acephate
XC4MDDig.abstract: A study was carried out to determine the toxicity of acephate to the algae,Scenedesmus obliquus,making use of a microscope with counting chamber.And a strain of bacteria designated as Y-6 was added into the solution to evaluate the effect of degrading acephate.It was shown that the median inhibition concentrations(EC50) were more than 159 mg/L in slightly acute toxicity.The further result showed that acephate was subchronic toxicity to algae with the EC50 of 7 d(174.68 mg/L),which was significantly lower than EC50 of 24 h(1 128.57 mg/L).When the high-degrading bacteria Y-6 was inoculated into the solution,the inhibition of alage by acephate was eased.

iTwyCg9I.title: Effects of penetration enhancers on the toxicity of beta-cypermethrin and epicuticle ultrastructure of three lepidopterous insects
iTwyCg9I.abstract: The effects of penetration enhancers,azone,thiazone and N-methyl-2-ketopyrrolidine,on the toxicity of beta-cypermethrin were investigated by bioassay in Spodoptera exigua(Hübner),Plutella xylostella(L.)and Helicoverpa armigera(Hübner),and their effects on epicuticle ultrastructure of the tested insects were observed by scanning electron microscope.The results showed that the LD_50 value of beta-cypermethrin with 3.0% N-methyl-2-ketopyrrolidine was 0.0074 μg/larva in P.xylostella.Beta-cypermethrin could be synergisted by N-methyl-2-ketopyrrolidine(the coefficient of toxicity was 2.0)in P.xylostella but not in S.exigua and H.armigera.However,the toxicity of beta-cypermethrin could not be enhanced by azone and thiazone in P.xylostella,S.exigua and H.armigera.The observations by scanning electron microscope showed that the cement layer of epicuticle in the fourth instar larvae of S.exigua was disappeared after treatment with penetration enhancers.The epicuticle ultrastructure in the fourth instar larvae of P.xylostella treated by N-methyl-2-ketopyrrolidine was not different from the control group,but the cement layer of epicuticle disappeared in the P.xylostella larvae treated by azone.The results suggested that the diversification of the cement layer of epicuticle was not the synergistic mechanism of penetration enhancers to beta-cypermethrin in the three lepidopterous insects.

7kR7X1td.title: Acute Toxicity Evaluation of Ninety-one Pesticides to Silkworm
7kR7X1td.abstract: The acute toxicity of ninety-one pesticides to silkworm,Bombyx mori L.,was evaluated in laboratory using the intake toxic leaf method,the toxic grades were compartmentalized according to the results and the safety evaluation was made for these pesticides.The LC50 values of thirty pesticides were lower than 0.5mg/kg mulberry(belonged to extremely toxic grade),including emamectin benzoate,abamectin,beta-cypermethrin,bifenthrin,tebufenozide and triazophos etc.;The LC50 values of fifteen pesticides were between 0.5～20mg/kg mulberry(belonged to high toxic grade),including carbosulfan,chlorfenapyr,triflumuron,fipronil,buprofezin,chloramine phosphorus and trichlorfon etc.;that of ninety pesticides were between 20～200mg/kg mulberry(belonged to moderate toxic grade);That of twenty-seven pesticides were higher than 200mg/kg mulberry(belonged to low toxic grade).

4iGHUDz5.title: Primary Aquatic Risk Assessment of Pesticides in European Union: Uncertainty Factor Approach of Standard Species
4iGHUDz5.abstract: It is important to build up an appropriate risk assessment system to evaluate the side-effect of pesticides on the environment in order to control the pesticide pollution.The European Commission(EC) has built up scientific systems in aquatic risk assessment of pesticides.Focusing on the uncertainty factor approach using standard test species in aquatic risk assessment of pesticides,this paper summarized the principle and method of EC tier system and the requirements to establish the levels of predicted environmental concentration(PEC) and regulatory acceptable concentration(RAC).Higher tier risk assessment was suggested for pesticides when the uncertainty factor approach using standard species was found to be excessively strict.And considering the current situation of China,it is necessary to master the primary risk assessment system first and then gradually carry out higher tier risk assessment.

oNvmFRZK.title: The Acute Oral Toxicity of 300 Formulated Pesticides to Apis mellifera
oNvmFRZK.abstract: [Aims]honey bee is one of the most important insects for plant pollination,but the honey bees are underlying the phenomenon of colony collapse disorder(ccD),one of the factors causing this problem is the much use of pesticides in agricultural production.Totally 300 pesticides were tested for their acute oral toxicity to honey bee(Apis mellifera)by dietary method in the paper,the objective of this study is to understand the status of toxicity of common used pesticides.[Results]The results indicated that the pesticides with very high toxicity,high toxicity,moderate toxicity and low toxicity pesticides accounted for 14.7,35.6,10.7,39%respectively,the high toxic and very high toxic pesticide covered more than 50%,and these pesticides were mainly the insecticides,while the fungicides and herbicides with relative low toxicity.The toxicity of different pesticide formulations with the same active ingredients(AI)to zebra fish maybe varied for the difference in Ai content,formulation type and processing technique.regarding to the biological pesticides,some of them still have high toxicity to honeybee.[Conclusions]These results suggested that the pesticides with high toxicity to honey bee covered a large proportion of common used pesticides in china,therefore,some precautions should be involved as we used the pesticides,particularly for insecticides to reduce or avoid the side effects on honey bee.

NqJ7G6fA.title: Visualized study on interface shape and growth of sliding bubble in narrow rectangular channel
NqJ7G6fA.abstract: Sliding bubble interface shape and bubble growth for the isolated bubble region in a narrow rectangular channel were observed from the wide side and narrow side of the narrow rectangular channel using a high speed digital camera. The results show that the growth rate of sliding bubble is small, and the growth rate of a small bubble is slightly larger than that of a large bubble. The sliding bubble appears to be spherical in shape according to the observation from the wide side of the narrow rectangular channel, but the sliding bubble is elongated in the direction normal to the heating surface from the side view. During the process of sliding bubble along the heating surface, the upstream and downstream contact angles are almost equal in this experimental condition.

B7CLMTag.title: Experimental research and numerical simulation of flow field near the narrow side in a rectangular narrow channel
B7CLMTag.abstract: The flow field near the narrow side in a vertical rectangular narrow channel is studied with the numerical simulation and visualization test.The results show that the hydrodynamics exchange is closely relative to Re.Hydrodynamics exchange near the narrow side does not exist in laminar flow,hydrodynamics exchange near the narrow side exists in turbulent flow,the hydrodynamics exchange at narrow side increases with the increasing Re.The Re of transition point,where hydrodynamics exchange from disappear to appear,is about 1900.

dD8P36oL.abstract: 3-D single-phase flow field in rod bundles with spacer grids was studied using numerical methodology.Using hybrid grids technique,employing standard k-ε model and SIMPLEC algorithm,the axial velocities obvious near the spacer grids than lateral velocities,it also influence the resistance character-istic obvious.Mixing vane affects lateral velocities much,and blends the axial velocity.

jHkj5wmV.title: Predicting velocity and motive mechanism of sliding bubble in vertical flow boiling
jHkj5wmV.abstract: The motive characteristic of the sliding bubble was studied to constitute the reasonable mechanism models. The dynamic equation of the sliding bubble was established according to the analysis of the balance of forces acting on the sliding bubble in vertical flow boiling. The velocity of the sliding bubble was obtained, and the predicted results were compared with the experimental data of Maity. The predicted results of the model show that the velocity of the sliding bubble increases with extending time, but the increase of the sliding velocity of bubble decreases gradually. The velocity of the sliding bubble is higher than that of the bulk liquid when the sliding bubble lifts from the wall, which indicates that the drag force and add-mass force become the resistances from the driving forces to make the bubble slide along the wall. When the velocity of the sliding bubble is larger than that of the local liquid, the shear lift force pushes the sliding bubble against the wall, and the inertia of the liquid induced beneath the bubble due to the variation in the bubble shape probably makes the sliding bubble lift from the wall.

lAXzUyqX.abstract: High speed camera visualized subcooled flow boiling bubble condensation experiments at 5 000 fps were conducted. Combined with the theoretic analysis, and considering the effect of convective heat transfer and the thickness of thermal boundary layer on condensation heat transfer, the relationship between dimensionless bubble diameter β and interface condensation heat transfer Nusselt number Nu Compared with experimental results, the error of the prediction is ranged within ±25%.

L4oXASwm.title: Numerical analysis of conjugate heat transfer for liquid-solid in narrow rectangular channel
L4oXASwm.abstract: The solid temperature field and the effect of heat conduction mechanism of the solid on heat transfer near the corner in a narrow rectangular channel are required to further understand when the un-heating region is optimized. The liquid-solid conjugate heat transfer in a narrow rectangular channel was numerical analyzed by using CFD code CFX. The results show that the heating concentration phenomenon can be avoided when the un-heating region of 1 mm × 2 mm near the corner is designed, and the effect of un-heating region on temperature field at the channel center is negligible. The distributions of inside wall heat flux and temperature are not uniform when heat conduction boundary condition of the solid near the un-heating region is set. The temperature of the solid in un-heating region is enhanced because of metal heat conduction, which contributes to enhance liquid temperature near the region. The effect of constant volume heat flux and constant wall heat flux on heat transfer is negligible when adiabatic boundary condition of solid near the un-heating region is set.

EnqspOfI.title: Active nucleation site density during subcooled flow boiling at vertical narrow rectangular channel
EnqspOfI.abstract: At present work, visualized subcooled flow boiling experiments were conducted using a flat stainless steel surface heater. Results indicate that the active nucleation site density of narrow channel is with the same tendency as the regular channels, which is proportioned to the heat flux. Mass flux is with little effect on the active nucleation site density of channel, but with effect on the onset of nucleate boiling. With the same heat flux, the narrower the channel, the highter the active nucleation site density. The effect of channel width on the active nucleation site density increases with the increasing of the heat flux.

PE7kQ0xC.title: Researches of the CHF prediction method in rod bundle
PE7kQ0xC.abstract: This paper deals with experimental and numerical computation analysis of the critical heat flux (CHF) occurrence at the conditions of subcooled boiling flow in rod bundles with grid spacers. The CFD code CFX4.4 has been used to predict CHF occurrence in subcooled boiling flows in rod bundle with grid spacer. The results show that CFD will be a powerful tool for application to nuclear fuel bundle CHF test, design and safety evaluation with the development of the code and physical model in the future.

1y5oo9ow.title: Numerical Simulation of Flow Field and Temperature Field Near the Wall Region in a Rectangular Narrow Channel
1y5oo9ow.abstract: Flow field and temperature field is very important for designing an optimized heated mode near the corner in a rectangular narrow channel, which is also one of the concerned problems of the deviser. To better understand the flow field and temperature field in a rectangular narrow channel, flow field and temperature field in a rectangular narrow channel were solved and analyzed. By the Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) code CFX, flow field and temperature field near the wall region in a rectangular narrow channel were obtained, and the effect of unheated region on flow field and temperature field was analyzed.

nu5njYCn.title: Prediction Model and Analysis for Velocity of Sliding Bubble Near Wall in Horizontal Flow Boiling
nu5njYCn.abstract: The sliding bubble plays an important role to enhance heat transfer.The secret understanding of the sliding bubble motive characteristic is required in order to constitute the reasonable mechanism models.The momentum equation on the sliding bubble was established according to the analysis of forces acting on the sliding bubble in horizontal flow boiling,and the velocity of the sliding bubble was obtained by numerical solving method.The prediction results were compared with the experimental results of Maity,and they agree very well.The velocity of the sliding bubble increases with increasing time,but the increase of the sliding velocity for bubble decreases gradually.The velocity of the sliding bubble is less than that of the local liquid,which shows that the drag force and add-mass force due to bubble expansion are driving force to make the bubble slide along the wall,and the shear lift force is driving force to make the sliding bubble lift off the wall.

gOLHOpqq.title: Analysis and discussion of flow boundary layer in fully turbulent of narrow rectangular channel
gOLHOpqq.abstract: This paper presents the flow and heat transfer in a narrow channel from the macrocosmic view, and the discussion of the flow boundary layer of the narrow rectangular channel by analysis of the results obtained by CFD code. The results show that some classical formulas in single phase are applied for narrow rectangular channels, and the current experimental results support the view that the flow and heat transfer of a narrow rectangular channel accords with that of an ordinary sized channel in fully turbulent. Secondly, the results obtained by CFD code with different turbulent models are compared with the classical formulas and experimental data, which shows that results obtained by CFD code is credible. Finally, according to microcosmic results obtained by CFD code and the velocities near the wall obtained by the classical formulas, the characteristics on flow boundary layer of the narrow rectangular channel in fully turbulent is discussed in detail.

7BZg1TDN.title: Phenomenon and analysis of motive bubbles near the narrow side in a rectangular narrow channel
7BZg1TDN.abstract: To understand the flow and heat transfer characteristics between the heated region and unheated region near the narrow side in a rectangular narrow channel,the behavior of motive bubbles near the narrow side in a rectangular narrow channel was investigated and analysed by means of the high-speed digital camera.The results show that the behavior of motive bubbles near the narrow side was complex,and the bubbles can slide towards the narrow side or the center of channel or the vertical direction,the diversities of the motive bubbles contributed to the hydrodynamics exchange between the unheated region and the heated region.The physical model of a bubble was described and established,which can explain the mechanism of the motive bubbles near the narrow side.

f2P1CNLT.title: Numerical Simulation of Flow Behavior in Tight Lattice Rod Bundle
f2P1CNLT.abstract: The Numerical investigation is performed on the air turbulent flow in triangular rod bundle array.Based on the experimental data,the eddy viscosity turbulent model and the Reynold stress turbulent model are evaluated to simulate the flow behavior in the tight lattice.The results show that SSG Reynolds Stress Model has shown superior predictive performance than other Reynolds-stress models,which indicates that the simulation of the anisotropy of the turbulence is significant in the tight lattice.The result with different Reynolds number and geometry shows that the magnitude of the secondary flow is almost independent of the Reynolds number,but it increases with the decrease of the P/D.

JqDRnZRG.title: Two Phase Heat Transfer Characteristics of Horizontal and Vertical Tube Heat Exchangers in Pool with Internal Heat Source
JqDRnZRG.abstract: Based on the geometrical structure and operation condition of test prototype of medical isotope reactor, the three-dimensional physical and mathematical models on the natural convection and bubbly driven two-phase convective heat transfer in the pool with internal heat source and with horizontal and vertical tube heat exchanger immerged were proposed, and the corresponding numerical simulation was performed. The computed heart transfer coefficients for different internal heat source and bubble flow rate were gained and compared with the detected ones by employing the analogy theory and dimension analysis, the empirical criteria correlations of Nusselt number of two phase heat transfer for the horizontal and vertical heat transfer exchanger was derived and compared with each other, which was provided with theoretical reference for the selection of the heat exchanger tube layout

iMfiPqx2.title: Effect of the configuration of the corner in a narrow rectangular channel on flow and heat transfer
iMfiPqx2.abstract: In order to further understand the effect of the configuration of the corner in a narrow rectangular channel on flow and heat transfer,flow field and temperature field in a narrow rectangular channel were numerical simulated by using CFD code CFX10.0.The results show under the condition of equal quantity of heat of solid which is obtained by decreasing the solid of the corner,the distributions of inside wall temperature for the orthogonal and circular type configurations of the corner are almost the same as that of the archetypal configuration,and those can simulate heat transfer of the archetypal configuration.Under the condition of equal Re,secondary flow and friction pressure of the orthogonal type configuration are almost the same as those of the circular type configuration,which shows that the circular type configuration of the corner in a narrow channel can substituted for the archetypal configuration to simulate flow and heat transfer in a narrow rectangular channel.

WcwF5vVG.title: An experimental investigation of bubble growth and effects on heat transfer in water subcooled flow boiling in a vertical narrow rectangular channel
WcwF5vVG.abstract: The nature of bubble growth in vertical rectangular narrow channel at atmospheric pressure was conducted using water as working fluid in present study.Laplace number(La) and non-dimensional time factor(ξ) are used in present paper for non-dimensionalization of bubble radius and bubble growth time,respectively.By analyzing the effects of mass flux and heat flux on dimensionless bubble growth,the authors found that the bubble growth could be restrained with increasing mass flux,but accelerated with increasing heat flux.The authors also found that the bubble growth could affect the nucleate boiling heat transfer coefficient,hNB,strongly,thereby,make big contribution to total heat transfer coefficient of tow phase boiling flow,htp.A non-dimensional bubble growth model with Reynolds number(Re) and non-dimensional time,t*1/3,is proposed in present study,and this model can predict the non-dimensional bubble growth well.

Nlc75QYR.title: Study on 3-D Flow Field in 5×5 Rod Bundles with Spacer Grids
Nlc75QYR.abstract: This paper studied the 3-D single-phase flow field in 5×5 rod bundles with spacer grids by numerical method. By using hybrid grids technique, SST k-ω model and SIMPLEC algorithm, the Reynolds averaged mass conservation equation and momentum conservation equation were solved, and the pressure and velocity field were obtained. The results show that the spacer grid leads to intense lateral flow in rod bundles channel, and the lateral vilocity submits parabola distributing raw; axial velocities are distributed uniformly in the channel, and drag coefficient decreases as inlet Reynolds in the universe degrade. Calculation results agreed with experiment data well.

rtvJ0vHD.title: Study on bubble growth and departure near wall in vertical narrow rectangular channel
rtvJ0vHD.abstract: It is very important to visually study bubble growth and departure for better understanding of boiling heat transfer in a narrow channel. Bubble growth and departure in a narrow rectangular under atmosphere pressure were visually observed by the wide and narrow side of narrow rectangular channel using high speed digital camera. There is a small interface between the bubble base and heated surface when the bubble is growing in the nucleate site, and the growing bubble shape is almost spherical. The bubble growth laws in different sites are almost uniform under the condition of the same thermal parameters, but bubble departure diameters are obvious distinct because of different sizes of nucleate sites. The bubble growth rate in a narrow rectangular channel is small, and the bubble departure time is long, the bubble growth diameter can be predicted using the amendatory Zuber expression. The effect of thermal parameters on bubble departure diameters of the mean was statistically analyzed in the camera view. Bubble departure diameters of the mean decrease with increasing heat flux, bubble departure diameters of the mean decrease with increasing inlet subcooling, and bubble departure diameters of the mean decrease with increasing bulk velocity.

LAOnMTTk.title: Simulation of vertical upward sub-cooled boiling flow in a pipe
LAOnMTTk.abstract: Multidimensional modeling of vertical upward subcooled boiling flow was performed and the local two-phase flow parameters (void fraction and bubble size) were calculated by using the computational fluid dynamics code-CFX4.4, in which lateral interfacial effects based on a three-dimensional two-fluid model were accounted for. A sensitivity analysis of the difference method, interfacial force and bubble-induced turbulence and bubble size was made. The method of using the CFD code for prediction of sub-cooled boiling flow in a pipe was established. The predicted lateral distributions of void fraction showed excellent agreement with the measurements at low void fraction, but somewhat larger difference at higher void fraction in vertical upward sub-cooled boiling flow. The predicted lateral distributions of vapor velocity and bubble diameter were not satisfactory. The results showed that a reasonable bubble diameter model and modeling of bubble coalescence and tearing would be necessary for improving calculation accuracy.

YpEnivrI.title: Numerical Study on Different Effects on Flow Field in 5×5 Rod Bundles Brought by Different Parts of Spacer Grids
YpEnivrI.abstract: In order to find out different effects for different parts of spacer grids,3-D single-phase flow field in 5×5 rod bundles with spacer grids by numerical method was studied.By using hybrid grids technique,SST k-ω model and SIMPLEC algorithm,the Reynolds averaged mass conservation equation and momentum conservation equations were solved,and the pressure and velocity fields were obtained.The results show that the mixing vane is the main factor of lateral velocity,spring and dimple influent the axial velocity,drag coefficient largely,and the effect of spring is larger.The mixing vane has the effect of blending and averaging the axial velocity.

lKlqWbdk.title: Flow and Heat Transfer Mechanism and Key Issues in a Narrow Channel
lKlqWbdk.abstract: The compact heat transfer device is widely applied in the engineering technology,which con-tributed to the development of flow and heat transfer mechanism in a narrow channel.The development of flow and heat transfer mechanism and its related key issues are presented,including measurement methods and related issues on flow and temperature field,nucleate phenomenon and flow pattern,pressure drop,heat transfer characteristic and critical heat flux which is very concerned in the engineering.Aiming at the research actuality and issues on the flow and heat transfer mechanism in a narrow channel at present,the research di-rections on the flow and heat transfer mechanism in a narrow channel are suggested.

w22S05ZX.title: Flow Behavior Analysis in Tight Lattice Rod Bundle Using CFD Method
w22S05ZX.abstract: Tight lattice rod bundles have been applied to reactors due to lts high conversion ratio.How-ever,there still exists big deficiency in understanding of the coolant flow characteristics inside the sub-channels of tight lattices.This paper investigates the turbulence air flow behavior inside both square and triangular tight lattice.The validity of both eddy viscosity models and Reynolds stress models is assessed by comparing computational results with experimental data.The results show a reasonable prediction of the nu-merical analysis using the Reynolds stress model SSG,except for the flow behavior in the gap region between the rod and the wall.The SSG model is not sensitive to the mesh structure,in the case the size of the near wall meshes satisfies y+<20,while the secondary moment closure ω model shows numerical oscillation with fine mesh sizes.

rBibYv9k.title: Experimental Study on Two-Phase Flow and Heat Transfer through Narrow Rectangular Channel under Middle-Low Pressure Condition
rBibYv9k.abstract: Two-phase boiling experiments have been performed in narrow rectangular channel at middle-low pressure.Based on the measured pressure drop and temperature across the test section,the effect of pressure and mass flow rate has been analyzed.Saturated boiling heat transfer was studied.And a new correlation has been developed for saturated boiling heat transfer under middle-low pressure condition.Additionally,based on the predigested one-dimensioned model of two-phase boiling flow,a new correlation has been developed for two-phase flow pressure drop under middle-low pressure condition.Furthermore,F parameter has been defined to expresses proportion of moistening perimeter between steam-phase and wall in this new correlation.The calculation results of new correlation predict well the experimental results.The average saturated boiling heat transfer coefficient is great impacted by system pressure,mass flow and heat flux.

XJfDPIGj.title: Experimental Study on Bubble Growth in Vertical Narrow Channel
XJfDPIGj.abstract: A visual investigation of vapor bubble growth in subcooled upward forced convection boiling in vertical rectangular narrow channel (the gap is 2 mm) was performed. High speed camera was used to record the bubble growth with a speed of 5000 fps(frames per second), and the picture size are 512×512 pixel. Experimental results about bubble growth in various work conditions (with variation heat flux and mass flux) were recorded; and based on the regression analysis, the exponential fitting relationship between the mean equivalent bubble diameter(De) and the bubble growth time was revealed. The results show that the exponential fitting can predict the mean bubble growth in narrow channel very well; but the coefficients of K and n, are quite different with that of conventional channel; and the K is less dependent on Ja number other than that of conventional channel, and the n has the value of wider range of 0.339～0.914.

vEWcIHqb.title: Visualization of Behavior of Subcooled Boiling Bubbles in Narrow Rectangular Slits
vEWcIHqb.abstract: Studies on visualization of the behavior,of subcooled boiling bubbles,in narrow rectangular slit shaped channels,have been conducted with the help of a high-speed digital camera.The effect of operational condition parameters on the bubble's nucleating onset,as well as the bubbles' dimensions,at the instant of detaching,have been analyzed.Results show that,under high subcooling conditions,steam bubbles appear and slide along on the narrow slit-channel's heating surface,and play an active role in enhancing the heat exchange within the slit channel.This sliding phenomena is intimetely related with the temperatvere of the main flow.The cause of this sliding phenomena is being analyzed.

CmauFkfN.title: Simulation of Thermal-Hydraulic Behavior in Tight Lattice Rod Bundle
CmauFkfN.abstract: The turbulence air thermal-hydraulic behavior inside the center and wall channel in tight lat-tice bundles is investigated.The wall temperature,wall shear stress,bulk temperature,bulk velocity,turbulent kinetic energy and turbulent mixing rate are analyzed by comparing the computational results with experi-mental data.The results show the increase of the non-uniformity of the parameters in tight lattice and the dis-crepancy between the calculation and the experiment with the decrease of P/D,and a temperature maximum appears in the gap region.This should be taken into account in the design of the fuel assembly with tight lat-tices.It is necessary to take the circumferential heat conduction of the channel wall into consideration in the simulation.

OvQrzjah.title: Study on motive characteristic of sliding bubble near wall in a vertical narrow rectangular channel
OvQrzjah.abstract: Motive characteristic of sliding bubble is visually observed by wide side and narrow side of the narrow rectangular channel using high speed digital camera. The results show that the bubble departing from the nucleate site slides along the heated surface, the typical sliding bubble phenomenon for narrow rectangular channels is observed in low heat flux, and the sliding bubble shape is spherical, and the upstream contact angle of sliding bubble on the heated surface is almost equal to the downstream contact angle of sliding bubble on the heated surface. The increase of the sliding bubble velocity is quick at the initial moment, and the sliding bubble velocity exceeds the local liquid velocity at some time. As the time increases, the sliding bubble velocity is almost equal. The sliding bubble velocity increases with increasing the bubble diameter. The sliding bubble velocity increases with increasing bulk velocity, and the trend of increasing sliding bubble velocity in large bulk velocity is larger than that in low bulk velocity.

xBFIMuah.title: Research Progress on Boiling Heat Transfer Mechanism of Sliding Bubble Near the Wall
xBFIMuah.abstract: The research on the sliding bubble is increasingly received a great attention during the process of studying of the boiling heat transfer.The research on the sliding bubble is far from mature at present.The new research progresses on the heat transfer mechanism of the sliding bubble near the wall in recent years are summarized,and the sliding bubble dynamics and the heat transfer mechanism of the sliding bubble near the wall are discussed.The model of the heat transfer mechanism and the calculation methods on sliding bubbles are summarized.The contents on the sliding bubble dynamics required to further continuous study are presented,and the heat transfer mechanism model on the sliding bubble is constituted.Finally,the research direction on the sliding bubbles was suggested.

RaC1YKVV.title: Effect of flow rate distribution at the inlet on hydrodynamic mixing in narrow rectangular multi-channel
RaC1YKVV.abstract: Flow and heat transfer in the narrow rectangular multi-channel is widely en- countered in the engineering application,hydrodynamic mixing in the narrow rectangu- lar multi-channel is one of the important concerns.With the help of the Computational Fluid Dynamics code CFX,the effect of flow rate distribution of the main channel at the inlet on hydrodynamic mixing in the narrow rectangular multi-channel is numerical sim- ulated.The results show that the flow rate distributions at the inlet have a great effect on hydrodynamics mixingin multi-channel,the flow rate in the main channel doesn't change with increasing the axial mixing section when the average flow rate at the inlet is set.Hydrodynamic mixing will arise in the mixing section when the different ratio of the flow rate distribution at the inlet is set,and hydrodynamic mixing increases with the difference of the flow rate distribution at the inlet increases.The trend of the flow rate distribution of the main channel is consistent during the whole axial mixing section,and hydrodynamic mixing in former 4 mixing section is obvious.

iWQS0Rwi.title: Experimental visualization coalesced interaction of sliding bubble near wall in vertical narrow rectangular channel
iWQS0Rwi.abstract: The characteristic of the coalesced sliding bubble was visually observed by wide side and narrow side of the narrow rectangular channel using high speed digital camera. The results show that the coalesced time among the sliding bubbles is quick, and the new formation of coalesced bubble is not lift-off, and it continues to slide along the heated surface in low heat flux for the isolated bubble region. The influence region is about 2 times projected area of the sliding bubble when the sliding bubbles begin to interact. The sliding bubble velocities increase duo to the interaction among the bubbles, which contributes to enhance heat transfer of this region. Finally, the effect of coalesced interaction of growing bubble in the nucleation sites on bubble lift-off was discussed and analyzed.

KYgFuMjh.title: Numerical simulation of hydrodynamic mixing in narrow rectangular multi-channel
KYgFuMjh.abstract: With the help of the Computational Fluid Dynamics code, hydrodynamic mixing in the narrow rectangular multi-channel is numerical simulated. The results show that the water flow rate in two side channels is lower than that in the mean main channel after passing through the whole axial mixing sections. Under the different ratios of the water flow rate at the inlet, the water flow rate in the mean main channels is consistent after passing through the whole axial mixing sections. Hydrodynamic mixing in former 4 mixing sections is obvious, and hydrodynamic mixing decreases with the increasing of the number of the axial mixing section. During the process of the mixing, the part of water in the mean main channel of the high flow rate at the inlet enters into the channel of the lower flow rate, and the secondary flow forms in the mixing section, but the secondary flow decreases with the increasing of the number of the axial mixing section.

c9wPQErd.title: Application of Hydrophobic Membrane Distillation Concentration Technology to Reuse Treatment of RO Concentrated Water
c9wPQErd.abstract: The hydrophobic membrane distillation(MD) concentration technology was applied for the treatment of concentrated water from low-pressure reverse osmosis(RO) system.The operation parameters of MD technology and the effect of the concentrated water pH and MD concentration factor(CF) on membrane flux and permeate water quality were investigated systemically.The Visual MINTEQ(ver 2.51) software was used to analyze the solubility and saturation indices of sparingly soluble salts such as CaCO3,CaSO4 and Mg(OH)2 at different pH,temperatures and CF during MD concentration.The control parameters of MD stable operation were determined.Finally,a 180-h MD experiment was carried out continually.The results demonstrate that the integrated double-membrane process of RO and MD has technical feasibility and maneuverability,and improves water recovery,achieving almost zero liquid discharge of RO system.

nASi6kKu.title: Analysis on the Investigation About the Prevalence Rate of Chronic HBV Infection
nASi6kKu.abstract: Objective To analyze the data between the correlative investigations and pilot study carried through in Chongqing to find out the prevalence rate and numbers of the chronic hepatitis B virus infection.Methods Comparing the investigation methods, populations,results,and case definition of chronic HBV infection;analyzing the methods and experiences of the pilot study.Results Among the 4 investigations of chronic HBV infection,the age-specific adjusted prevalence rate of the chronic HBV infection is 2771.4/100,000;158.25/100,000;115.77/100,000,and 707.97/100,000 respectively.The data of the chronic HBV infection screened by questionnaire investigation are remarkable different from those screened by Lab tests and clinic examine.Conclusion The results reveal that the screening case of the chronic HBV infection by Lab tests and clinic examines is better than by questionnaire investigation,and suggest that it is important not only in knowing about the characteristic of HBV and epidemic but also in choosing the potent investigation means when the investigation on the prevalence rate of the chronic HBV infection is carried through in China.

pJUPaWSi.title: Study on Hepatitis B Birth Dose Coverage in the Western and Midlevel Provinces of China
pJUPaWSi.abstract: Objective To better understand the timely delivery of Hepatitis B birth dose and try to find out ways to improve the coverage of Hepatitis B birth dose of the Central and Western Provinces of China.Methods According to the Alliance of the MOH/GAVI Project,a questionnaire and local survey for the coverage of Hepatitis B birth dose was carried out in the areas selected from the GAVI Project Provinces. Results The coverage rate of Hepatitis B birth dose was 74.01% in the children born in 2003,and for 2004,the rate was 81.55%.The coverage of Hepatitis B birth dose in the children born in the hospitals(81.55%) was higher than those born in home(19%).The coverage of Hepatitis B birth dose in the children born in hospitals at country levels (88.27%) is better than those born in township hospitals. Conclusion The results showed that the coverage of Hepatitis B birth dose was gradually increasing in the Central and Western Provinces,especially in the children born in home,since Hepatitis B vaccine was integrated into the Expanded Program on Immunization(EPI)and suggested that it was important to improve the coverage of Hepatitis B birth dose in the children born in village hospitals and home in the future.

hP5DD6UT.title: Epidemiological Analysis of the Japanese B Encephalitis in China During 2000-2004
hP5DD6UT.abstract: Objective To understand the epidemic situation of Japanese B Encephalitis(JE)in China during 2000-2004 and provide the scientific basis for controlling JE in the future.Methods The data of JE from NNDRS during 2000-2004 was analyzed by Excel 97.Results (1)During 2000-2004,the reported incidence of JE is(0.948 9)/(100 000),(0.770 7)/(100 000),(0.654 8)/(100 000),(0.582 9)/(100 000),(0.402 1)/(100 000),respectively.(2)The JE cases were mainly reported in some Provinces including Guizhou,Sichuan,Chongqing,Henan,Yunnan,and Shaanxi Provinces.(3)About 90% of the reported JE cases were children under 15 years old.Conclusion The results reveal that the reported incidence of JE has gradually decreased and suggest that the effectiveness of the JE prevention and control has achieved enormous success.

xcs5I8oz.title: Epidemiological Analysis on Reported Hepatitis B Under 15 Years in China
xcs5I8oz.abstract: Objective Evaluating the surveillance system through analyzing the reported cases of hepatitis B in surveillance System of China,National immunization Programme and National Notifiable Disease Reporting System.Method To compare and analyze the reported cases of Hepatitis B.Result Reported cases in Surveillance System of China National Immunization Programme were incomplete,and much less than the cases reported in National Notifiable Disease Reporting System.The case definition of surveillance is unclear to the people in charging the reporting.Conclusion It is necessary to establish the national surveillance system of hepatitis B and to report the acute cases of children under 15 years old.

5a2HrqsT.title: Study on the Status of Sanitizing and HBV Contamination of Appliances Used in the Public Service Places
5a2HrqsT.abstract: Objective To know the status about sanitizing and HBV contamination of appliances used in the public service places.Methods 63 beauty parlors,footbathing inns,haircutting inns and bathing centers were selected by stratified randomization sampling,682 workers were investigated by questionnaire.The HBsAg in the appliances of the public service places was detected by RIA.Results There were two main sanitizing modes that were alcohol cleaning(34.60%)and ultraviolet light disinfection(30.79%).The testing rate of HBsAg with the appliances of the public service places was 2.13%.The testing rate of HBsAg in large-,medium and small-sized appliances was 0.63%,2.67% and 3.70% respectively.The postive rate of HBsAg among large-,medium-and small-sized appliances has statistic different(χ2=6.68,P<0.05=.The testing rate of HBsAg among the appliances of beauty parlors,barbering shops and footbath inns were 2.97%,0.61% and 3.42% respectively.Different appliances had different rate of HBsAg,such as thd rate of HBsAg among the acne needle and the forceps were 5.13% and 4.17%.And the HBsAg positiv ally on knives,was on pedicure knives(8/131=6.11%),shaves(2/63=3.17%)and scissors(1/193=0.52%);The testing rate of HBsAg on the knives used in the beauty parlors,the footbathing inns and the haircutting inns were different,the rate is highest(8.33%)in the footbathing inns.Conclusions It is important to enhance the sanitizing management of the appliances used in the public service places and improve workers the Knowledge,Attitude,and Practice(KAP)of Hepatitis B vaccination.We should promote the pubic health education to enhance the knowledge of control and prevention of Hepatitis B and build up the supervision consciousness.

D72y0eDh.title: Study on the probability of hepatitis B virus infection at public service places]
D72y0eDh.abstract: To provide data for the control and prevention of hepatitis B and HBV surface antigen (HBsAg) status among the appliances and practitioners working in the public service places.63 beauty parlors, barber shops and bathing centers selected under stratified randomization sampling method and 682 workers were investigated through questionnaire. HBsAg from th e appliances of the public service places and employee was detected by RIA.Two main sanitizing modes that including alcohol cleaning (34.60%) and ultraviolet light disinfection (30.79%) were used. The rates of testing on HBsAg among the appliances were 2.13% at the public service places, and were 0.63%, 2.67% and 3.70% in large-, medium- and small-sized appliances respectively. The rate of testing on HBsAg on large-, medium- and small- sized appliances were statistically different (chi2 = 6.68, P < 0.05). The positive rates of HBsAg on the appliances of beauty parlors, barbering shops and footbath inns were 2.97%, 0.61% and 3.42% respectively. People working in different service sites had different rates of HBsAg: those who worked at the 'acne needle' and the forceps were 5.13% and 4.17%. The positive rate of HBsAg among the workers in the public service places was 7.13%. The rates of HBsAgamong the workers in large-, medium- and small-sized public service places were 7.34%, 8.33% and 2.94% respectively. The rates of HBsAg among the workers in beauty parlors, barbering shops, footbath inns and bathing centers were 9.01%, 6.37%, 4.35% and 7.29% respectively. HBsAg positive rates were different among the workers working at different service sites: 13.33% at tattoo business, 12.68% in pedicles workers and 8.03% in massagists.It is important to improve the sanitizing management of the appliances used in the public service places and to improve the knowledge, attitude, as well as practice of vaccination on hepatitis B among those populations.

55PEA7Yq.title: Review on Training on Hepatitis B Vaccine Immunization and Safe Injection
55PEA7Yq.abstract: Objective To know and evaluate the developing situation and training effect on hepatitis B vaccine immunization and safe injection training to put forward valuable recommendations about training activity.Methods Questionnaire survey,observing,focus group/informal discussion and examination of relative knowledge for county level,township level and village level EPI staff were engaged in the study.Results Training for village level had been completed in most provinces,coverage rate was more than 80%;Students felt satisfied for training materials,but unsatisfied for teachers and training condition.80% questions can be answered correctly by county level staff,but less than half village doctors can answered correctly 50% questions, strengthening training is needed in the county fevel staff.Conclusion This training results are dissatisfied because lacking of training fund and materials,without necessary equipment for training,conduct multimedia training can not be carried out.After strengthening training,the EPI staff who missed the training have got the such knowledge,and resolved suitably practical problems,and strengthened the capability and skill of county level teachers.
